00102 // My own derived class for managing my configuration files:
00103 //
00104 class MyParams : public Params 
00105 {
00106 public:
00107         
00108   MyParams( int argc, char **argv ) : Params( argc, argv ) { }
00109         
00110   ~MyParams( ) { }
00111         
00112   void readParams()
00113   {
00114     // Call the main program with parameters "-conf [filename]"
00115     if ( scanFrom(confFile.c_str()) ) 
00116       { 
00117         std::cout << "Name of the configuration file: " << confFile << std::endl;
00118       } 
00119     else
00120       {
00121         std::cerr << "No valid configuration file given! (" << confFile  << ")" << std::endl;
00122         exit(0);
00123       }
00124   }
00125         
00126   void io( std::istream& is, std::ostream& os, FileUtil::iotype type )
00127   {
00128     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Standard1"    , Standard1, true, type);
00129     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Standard2"    , Standard2, false, type);
00130     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Derandomize"  , Derandomize, false, type);
00131     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Rotate"       , Rotate, false, type);
00132     FileUtil::io( is, os, "GSA"          , GSA, false, type);
00133     FileUtil::io( is, os, "IDA"          , IDA, false, type);
00134     FileUtil::io( is, os, "CMA"          , CMA, false, type);
00135     FileUtil::io( is, os, "baseSize"     , baseSize, 1350u, type);
00136     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Seed"         , Seed,  1234u, type);
00137     FileUtil::io( is, os, "MU"           , MU, 15u, type);
00138     FileUtil::io( is, os, "LAMBDA"       , LAMBDA, 100u, type);
00139     FileUtil::io( is, os, "PLUSSTRATEGY" , PLUSSTRATEGY, false, type);
00140     FileUtil::io( is, os, "MOOF"         , MOOF, 1u, type);
00141     FileUtil::io( is, os, "USEDWA"       , USEDWA, true, type);
00142     FileUtil::io( is, os, "USEBWA"       , USEBWA, false, type);
00143     FileUtil::io( is, os, "FREQUENCY"    , FREQUENCY, 500u, type);
00144     FileUtil::io( is, os, "PHASE"        , PHASE, .0, type);
00145     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Recombine"    , Recombine, false, type); 
00146     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Dimension"    , Dimension, 2u, type);
00147     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Iterations"   , Iterations, 2000u, type);
00148     FileUtil::io( is, os, "CheckSigma"   , CheckSigma, false, type); 
00149     FileUtil::io( is, os, "SigmaLower"   , SigmaLower, 0.004, type);
00150     FileUtil::io( is, os, "numArchive"   , numArchive, 200u, type);
00151     FileUtil::io( is, os, "NICHE"        , NICHE, 0.05, type);
00152     FileUtil::io( is, os, "MinInit"      , MinInit, -2., type);  
00153     FileUtil::io( is, os, "MaxInit"      , MaxInit, 2., type); 
00154     FileUtil::io( is, os, "SigmaMin"     , SigmaMin, 1., type);
00155     FileUtil::io( is, os, "SigmaMax"     , SigmaMax, 1., type);
00156     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Interval"     , Interval, 100u, type);
00157     FileUtil::io( is, os, "Stopping"     , Stopping, false, type);
00158     FileUtil::io( is, os, "FileName"     , FileName, 1u, type);
00159   }

00161   // Method to show the current content of the class variable: 
00162   void monitor( )
00163   {
00164     std::cout << "Standard1 "   << Standard1    << std::endl;
00165     std::cout << "Standard2 "   << Standard2    << std::endl;
00166     std::cout << "Derandomize " << Derandomize  << std::endl;
00167     std::cout << "Rotate "      << Rotate       << std::endl;
00168     std::cout << "GSA "         << GSA          << std::endl;
00169     std::cout << "IDA "         << IDA          << std::endl;
00170     std::cout << "CMA "         << CMA          << std::endl;
00171     std::cout << "baseSize "    << baseSize     << std::endl;
00172     std::cout << "Seed  "       << Seed         << std::endl;
00173     std::cout << "MU "          << MU           << std::endl;
00174     std::cout << "LAMBDA "      << LAMBDA       << std::endl;
00175     std::cout << "PLUSSTRATEGY "<< PLUSSTRATEGY << std::endl;
00176     std::cout << "MOOF "        << MOOF         << std::endl;
00177     std::cout << "USEDWA "      << USEDWA       << std::endl;
00178     std::cout << "USEBWA "      << USEBWA       << std::endl;
00179     std::cout << "FREQUENCY "   << FREQUENCY    << std::endl;
00180     std::cout << "PHASE "       << PHASE        << std::endl;
00181     std::cout << "Recombine "   << Recombine    << std::endl;
00182     std::cout << "Dimension "   << Dimension    << std::endl;
00183     std::cout << "Iterations "  << Iterations   << std::endl;
00184     std::cout << "CheckSigma "  << CheckSigma   << std::endl;
00185     std::cout << "SigmaLower "  << SigmaLower   << std::endl;
00186     std::cout << "numArchive "  << numArchive   << std::endl;
00187     std::cout << "NICHE "       << NICHE        << std::endl;
00188     std::cout << "MinInit "     << MinInit      << std::endl;
00189     std::cout << "MaxInit "     << MaxInit      << std::endl;
00190     std::cout << "SigmaMin "    << SigmaMin     << std::endl;
00191     std::cout << "SigmaMax "    << SigmaMax     << std::endl;
00192     std::cout << "Interval "    << Interval     << std::endl;
00193     std::cout << "Stopping "    << Stopping     << std::endl;
00194     std::cout << "FileName "    << FileName     << std::endl;
00195   }

00197   bool Standard1;
00198   bool Standard2;
00199   bool Derandomize;
00200   bool Rotate;
00201   bool GSA;
00202   bool IDA;
00203   bool CMA;
00204   unsigned baseSize;
00205   unsigned Seed;
00206   unsigned MU;
00207   unsigned LAMBDA;
00208   bool PLUSSTRATEGY;
00209   unsigned MOOF;
00210   bool USEDWA;
00211   bool USEBWA;
00212   unsigned FREQUENCY;
00213   double PHASE;
00214   bool Recombine;
00215   unsigned Dimension;
00216   unsigned Iterations;
00217   bool CheckSigma;
00218   double SigmaLower;
00219   unsigned numArchive;
00220   double NICHE;
00221   double MinInit;
00222   double MaxInit;
00223   double SigmaMin;
00224   double SigmaMax;
00225   unsigned Interval;
00226   bool Stopping;
00227   unsigned FileName ;
00228 };
00229 
00230 // main program
00231 int main (int argc, char* argv[])
00232 {
00233   unsigned i,j;
00234 
00235   MyParams param( argc, argv );
00236         
00237   param.setDefault( );
00238   //param.readParams();
00239   param.monitor();
00240 
00241   unsigned NSigma;
00242   unsigned NELITE;
00243   std::vector< double > weight( 2 );
00244   int      domination;
00245   double   mindistanceIA, mindistanceAA;
00246  
00247   //char MatlabCommand[200];
00248   //double Var1, Var2, Var3, Var4;
00249 
00250   //Other Variables
00251   if ( param.Standard1 ){
00252     NSigma = param.Dimension;
00253   }
00254   else if ( param.Standard2 ){
00255     NSigma = param.Dimension;
00256   }
00257   else if ( param.Derandomize ){
00258     std::cout << "Not defined" << std::endl;
00259     exit(-1);
00260   }
00261   else if ( param.Rotate ){
00262     NSigma = (unsigned)( 0.5 * ( 1 + param.Dimension ) * param.Dimension );
00263   }
00264   else if ( param.GSA ){
00265     NSigma = 1 + param.baseSize * param.Dimension;
00266   }
00267   else if ( param.IDA ){
00268     NSigma = 2 + 3 * param.Dimension;
00269   }
00270   else if ( param.CMA ){
00271     NSigma = 1 + ( 2 + param.Dimension ) * param.Dimension;
00272   }
00273   else {
00274     exit(-1);
00275   }
00276 
00277   double *XP = new double[ (unsigned)param.MU ];
00278   double *YP = new double[ (unsigned)param.MU ];        
00279   double *XO = new double[ (unsigned)param.LAMBDA ];
00280   double *YO = new double[ (unsigned)param.LAMBDA ];    
00281   double *XA = new double[ (unsigned)param.numArchive ];
00282   double *YA = new double[ (unsigned)param.numArchive ];        
00283         
00284   double           f1=0, f2=0;
00285   // First Weight
00286   if ( param.USEDWA ){
00287     weight[ 0 ] = 0.5 + 0.5 * sin( param.PHASE * 3.141592 );
00288     weight[ 1 ] = 1.0 - weight[ 0 ];
00289   }
00290   else if ( param.USEBWA ){
00291     if ( (unsigned)param.PHASE % 2 == 0 ){
00292       weight[ 0 ] = 1.0;
00293     }
00294     else {
00295       weight[ 0 ] = 0.0;
00296     }
00297     weight[ 1 ] = 1.0 - weight[ 0 ];
00298   }
00299   //Random Seed
00300   Rng::seed( param.Seed );
00301 
00302   //Define Populations
00303   PopulationMOO parents   ( param.MU,     
00304                             ChromosomeT< double >( param.Dimension ), ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma ));
00305   PopulationMOO offsprings( param.LAMBDA, 
00306                             ChromosomeT< double >( param.Dimension ), ChromosomeT< double >( NSigma ));
00307 
00308   //Set the Number of Objective Functions
00309   parents   .setNoOfObj( 2 );
00310   offsprings.setNoOfObj( 2 );
00311 
00312   //Task ( Minimize or Maximize )
00313   parents.   setMinimize( );
00314   offsprings.setMinimize( );
00315 
00316   //Archive
00317   ArchiveMOO archive( (unsigned)param.numArchive );
00318   archive.minimize( );
00319 
00320   //Initialize Parent Population
00321   for ( i = 0; i < param.MU; i++ ){
00322     dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ).initialize( param.MinInit, param.MaxInit );
00323     if ( param.Standard1 ){
00324       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initialize( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax );
00325     }
00326     else if ( param.Standard2 ){
00327       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initialize( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax );
00328     }
00329     else if ( param.Derandomize ){
00330       std::cout << "Not defined" << std::endl;
00331       exit(-1);
00332     }
00333     else if ( param.Rotate ){
00334       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initializeRotate( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax );
00335     }
00336     else if ( param.GSA ){
00337       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initializeGSA( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax, param.baseSize );
00338     }
00339     else if ( param.IDA ){
00340       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initializeIDA( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax );
00341     }
00342     else if ( param.CMA ){
00343       dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][1] ).initializeCMA( param.SigmaMin, param.SigmaMax );
00344     }
00345     else {
00346       exit(-1);
00347     }
00348   }
00349 
00350   // PLUS Strategy
00351   if ( param.PLUSSTRATEGY ){
00352     NELITE = param.MU;
00353   }
00354   else {
00355     NELITE = 0;
00356   }
00357 
00358   //Evaluate Parents ( only needed for elitist strategy )
00359   if ( param.PLUSSTRATEGY ){
00360     for ( i = 0; i < param.MU; i++ ){
00361       switch(param.MOOF)
00362         {
00363         case 1:
00364           f1 = SphereF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00365           f2 = SphereF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00366           break;
00367         case 2:
00368           f1 = DebConvexF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00369           f2 = DebConvexF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00370           break;
00371         case 3:
00372           f1 = DebConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00373           f2 = DebConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00374           break;
00375         case 4:
00376           f1 = DebDiscreteF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00377           f2 = DebDiscreteF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00378           break;
00379         case 5:
00380           f1 = FonsecaConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00381           f2 = FonsecaConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00382           break;
00383         default:
00384           std::cerr << "Specify fitness function. Current setting of MOOF (1-5):" << param.MOOF << std::endl;
00385           break;
00386         }
00387       parents[i].setMOOFitnessValues( f1, f2 );
00388       XP[ i ] = f1;
00389       YP[ i ] = f2;
00390     }
00391     parents.aggregation( weight );
00392   }
00393 
00394   //Iterate
00395   for( unsigned t = 1; t < param.Iterations + 1; t++ ) {
00396     //Weight
00397     if ( param.USEDWA ){
00398       weight[ 0 ] = 0.5 + 0.5 * sin( ( param.PHASE + (double)(t-1)/(double)param.FREQUENCY ) * 3.141592 );
00399       weight[ 1 ] = 1.0 - weight[ 0 ];
00400     }
00401     else if ( param.USEBWA ){
00402       if ( (unsigned)(param.PHASE+(double)(t-1)/(double)param.FREQUENCY) % 2 == 0 ){
00403         weight[ 0 ] = 1.0;
00404       }
00405       else {
00406         weight[ 0 ] = 0.0;
00407       }
00408       weight[ 1 ] = 1.0 - weight[ 0 ];
00409     }
00410 
00411     //Print Generation
00412     std::cout << "Generation  = " << t;
00413     std::cout << "   archive  = " << archive.size( );
00414     std::cout << "   w1 = " << weight[ 0 ];
00415     std::cout << "   w2 = " << weight[ 1 ] << std::endl;
00416 
00417     // Calculate Fitness in Parents
00418     parents.aggregation( weight );
00419 
00420     //Generate New Offsprings
00421     for ( i = 0; i < param.LAMBDA; i++ ){
00422       IndividualMOO& pap = parents.random( );
00423       IndividualMOO& mom = parents.random( );
00424       ChromosomeT< double >& objvar = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[i][0] );
00425       ChromosomeT< double >& sigma  = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[i][1] );
00426 
00427       //Recombination & Mutation
00428       if ( param.Standard1 ){
00429         if ( param.Recombine ){
00430           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00431           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00432         }
00433         else {
00434           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00435             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00436           }
00437           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00438             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00439           }
00440         }
00441         double tau0 = 1.0 / sqrt( 2.0 * (double)param.Dimension );
00442         double tau1 = 1.0 / sqrt( 2.0 * sqrt( (double)param.Dimension ));
00443         sigma.mutateLogNormal( tau0, tau1 );
00444         if (param.CheckSigma){
00445           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00446             if ( sigma[ j ] < param.SigmaLower * fabs( objvar[ j ] ) ){
00447               sigma[ j ] = param.SigmaLower * fabs( objvar[ j ] );
00448             }
00449           }
00450         }
00451         objvar.mutateNormal( sigma, true );
00452       }
00453       else if ( param.Standard2 ){
00454         if ( param.Recombine ){
00455           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00456           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00457         }
00458         else {
00459           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00460             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00461           }
00462           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00463             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00464           }
00465         }
00466         double xi_prob = 0.5;
00467         sigma.mutateMSR( xi_prob );
00468         for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00469           sigma[ j ] = sigma[ j ] / sqrt((double)sigma.size( ) );
00470         }
00471         if (param.CheckSigma){
00472           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00473             if ( sigma[ j ] < param.SigmaLower * fabs( objvar[ j ] ) ){
00474               sigma[ j ] = param.SigmaLower * fabs( objvar[ j ] );
00475             }
00476           }
00477         }
00478         objvar.mutateNormal( sigma, true );
00479         for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00480           sigma[ j ] = sigma[ j ] * sqrt( sigma.size( ) );
00481         }
00482       }
00483       else if ( param.Derandomize ){
00484         std::cout << "Not defined" << std::endl;
00485         exit(-1);
00486       }
00487       else if ( param.Rotate ){
00488         if ( param.Recombine ){
00489           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00490           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00491         }
00492         else {
00493           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00494             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00495           }
00496           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00497             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00498           }
00499         }
00500         objvar.mutateRotate( sigma );
00501       }
00502       else if ( param.GSA ){
00503         if ( param.Recombine ){
00504           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00505           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00506         }
00507         else {
00508           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00509             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00510           }
00511           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00512             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00513           }
00514         }
00515         objvar.mutateGSA( sigma );
00516       }
00517       else if ( param.IDA ){
00518         if ( param.Recombine ){
00519           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00520           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00521         }
00522         else {
00523           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00524             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00525           }
00526           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00527             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00528           }
00529         }
00530         objvar.mutateIDA( sigma );
00531       }
00532       else if ( param.CMA ){
00533         if ( param.Recombine ){
00534           objvar.recombineDiscrete       ( pap[ 0 ], mom[ 0 ] );
00535           sigma .recombineGenIntermediate( pap[ 1 ], mom[ 1 ] );
00536         }
00537         else {
00538           for ( j = 0; j < objvar.size( ); j++ ){
00539             objvar[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 0 ] )[ j ];
00540           }
00541           for ( j = 0; j < sigma.size( ); j++ ){
00542             sigma[ j ] = dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( pap[ 1 ] )[ j ];
00543           }
00544         }
00545         objvar.mutateCMA( sigma );
00546       }
00547       else {
00548         exit(-1);
00549       }    
00550     }
00551     //Evaluate Objective Function
00552     for ( j = 0; j < param.LAMBDA; j++ ){
00553       switch(param.MOOF)
00554         {
00555         case 1:
00556           f1 = SphereF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00557           f2 = SphereF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00558           break;
00559         case 2:
00560           f1 = DebConvexF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00561           f2 = DebConvexF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00562           break;
00563         case 3:
00564           f1 = DebConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00565           f2 = DebConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00566           break;
00567         case 4:
00568           f1 = DebDiscreteF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00569           f2 = DebDiscreteF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00570           break;
00571         case 5:
00572           f1 = FonsecaConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00573           f2 = FonsecaConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( offsprings[j][0] ));
00574           break;
00575         default:
00576           std::cerr << "Specify fitness function. Current setting of MOOF (1-5):" << param.MOOF << std::endl;
00577           break;
00578         }
00579       offsprings[j].setMOOFitnessValues( f1, f2 );
00580       XO[ j ] = f1;
00581       YO[ j ] = f2;
00582     }
00583     offsprings.aggregation( weight );
00584    
00585     // Selection ( Mu, Labmda ) or ( Mu + Lambda )
00586     parents.selectMuLambda( offsprings, NELITE );
00587 
00588 
00589     for ( i = 0; i < param.MU; i++ ){
00590       switch(param.MOOF)
00591         {
00592         case 1:
00593           f1 = SphereF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00594           f2 = SphereF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00595           break;
00596         case 2:
00597           f1 = DebConvexF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00598           f2 = DebConvexF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00599           break;
00600         case 3:
00601           f1 = DebConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00602           f2 = DebConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00603           break;
00604         case 4:
00605           f1 = DebDiscreteF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00606           f2 = DebDiscreteF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00607           break;
00608         case 5:
00609           f1 = FonsecaConcaveF1( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00610           f2 = FonsecaConcaveF2( dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< double >& >( parents[i][0] ));
00611           break;
00612         default:
00613           std::cerr << "Specify fitness function. Current setting of MOOF (1-5):" << param.MOOF << std::endl;
00614           break;
00615         }
00616       parents[i].setMOOFitnessValues( f1, f2 );
00617       XP[ i ] = f1;
00618       YP[ i ] = f2;
00619     }
00620     parents.aggregation( weight );
00621 
00622     // Store Parent Data
00623     for ( j = 0; j < parents.size( ); j++ ){
00624       XP[ j ] = parents[ j ].getMOOFitness( 0 );
00625       YP[ j ] = parents[ j ].getMOOFitness( 1 );
00626     }
00627 
00628     // Archive
00629     for ( j = 0; j < offsprings.size( ); j++ ){
00630       domination = archive.Dominate( offsprings[ j ] );
00631       mindistanceIA = archive.distanceOnFitness( offsprings[ j ] );
00632       if ( domination > 2 ){
00633         archive.delDominateArchive( offsprings[ j ] );
00634         archive.addArchive( offsprings[ j ] );
00635       }
00636       else if ( domination == 2 ){
00637         if ( mindistanceIA > param.NICHE ){
00638           if ( archive.getCapacity( ) > 0 ){
00639             archive.addArchive( offsprings[ j ] );
00640           }
00641           else {
00642             mindistanceAA = archive.minDistanceOnFitness( );
00643             if ( mindistanceIA > mindistanceAA ){
00644               archive.delSharingWorst( );
00645               archive.addArchive( offsprings[ j ] );
00646             }
00647             else {
00648             }
00649           }
00650         }
00651         else {
00652         }
00653       }
00654       else {
00655       }
00656     }
00657 
00658     // Store Archive Data
00659     for ( j = 0; j < archive.size( ); j++ ){
00660       XA[ j ] = archive.readArchive( j ).getMOOFitness( 0 );
00661       YA[ j ] = archive.readArchive( j ).getMOOFitness( 1 );
00662     }
00663 
00664     if ( t % param.Interval == 0 ){
00665       if ( param.Stopping ){
00666         std::cout << "\n Hit Return Key for Continue" << std::endl;
00667         fgetc(stdin);
00668       }
00669     }
00670   }
00671   
00672   char dummy[ 80 ];
00673   unsigned filenumber = param.FileName;
00674   sprintf( dummy, "Archive%i.txt", filenumber );
00675   archive.saveArchive( dummy );
00676   std::cout << "\nThe result is stored in " << dummy << "\n" << std::endl;
00677   std::cout << "Number of Solutions" << std::endl;
00678   std::cout << "Number of Objectives" << std::endl;
00679   std::cout << "Solution 1 (f1,f2,...)" << std::endl;
00680   std::cout << "Solution 2 (f1,f2,...)\n" << std::endl;
00681 
00682   std::cout << "Hit Return Key for End" << std::endl;
00683   fgetc(stdin);
00684 
00685   delete [] XP;
00686   delete [] YP;
00687   delete [] XO;
00688   delete [] YO;
00689   delete [] XA;
00690   delete [] YA;
00691 
00692   return 0;
00693 }
